Dear Romy and Fabulous Repossi Team,

Congratulations on bringing this stunning beauty to AbuDhabi. 

Thank you to all who been involved in this milestone and much appreciate the efforts. 

All the best wishes for our great Repossi team in AbuDhabi and looking forward to meeting you in person at your amazing Boutique. 

Best Regards  مع تحياتي و تقديري،

NASSER ALBLOOSHI

halhoub.com>; Aaiza Zafar <Aaiza.Zafar@chalhoub.com>; Layan Said <Layan.Said@chalhoub.com>; Arbi Triki <Arbi.Triki@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - NEW STORE OPENING | Repossi - The Galleria Mall 
 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of Repossi - The Galleria Mall

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the 07st Aug 2025 at 10am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project : 

 

*	
	Brand team, @Essam Deiri <mailto:Essam.Deiri@chalhoub.com>  @Alienor Balland <mailto:Alienor.Balland@me.zimmermann.com>  @repossi galleria <mailto:repossi.galleria@chalhoub.com> 
*	
	IT team @Jayesh Jayadevan <mailto:Jayesh.Jayadevan@chalhoub.com> @Faisal Abdukunju <mailto:Faisal.Abdukunju@chalhoub.com>  @Real Emirates - IT
*	
	Admin team @Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  @Pierre BAA SOLO <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  
*	
	Maintenance team @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  @Sreeraj Prakasam <mailto:Sreeraj.Prakasam@chalhoub.com> 
*	
	GA team @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 
*	
	Accounts @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  @Mohamed Rauf <mailto:Mohamed.Rauf@chalhoub.com> 
*	
	Logistics / Warehouse @Sredha Mathai <mailto:Sredha.Mathai@chalhoub.com>  @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net> 
*	
	Group Security @Rawad Hossein <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> 
*

*	
	Kronos @Irfan Yusuf <mailto:Irfan.Yusuf@chalhoub.com>

Subject: RSO UAE - NEW STORE OPENING | Repossi - The Galleria Mall 

 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of Repossi - The Galleria Mall

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the 07st Aug 2025 at 10am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project :
